browse.title: Browse Compounds
browse.description: Filter and display compounds from the database by different categories
browse.select_compound: Please select a compound to view details

query.title: Chemical Structure Query
query.description: Use Ketcher chemical editor to draw molecular structures and search
query.draw_structure_first: Please draw a chemical structure first
query.search_failed: Search failed, please try again later

home.welcome_description: MNPLib is a comprehensive database of deep-sea natural products and their derivatives, funded by the National Key Research and Development Program of China, which provides integrated information on chemical structures, sources, bioactivities, NMR, and MS data.
home.title: Marine Compound Browser Website
home.description: Explore a comprehensive database of marine bioactive compounds with support for chemical structure queries, similarity searches, and substructure matching.
home.features_subtitle: Powerful cheminformatics tools and database functionality
home.feature1_description: Browse the complete marine compound database with support for category filtering and pagination.
home.feature2_description: Use the Ketcher chemical editor for exact structure matching, substructure search, and similarity search.
home.feature3_description: RDKit-based cheminformatics calculations supporting molecular fingerprints, similarity calculations, and substructure matching.
